title: Braum killed my bird :(
body:
I was playing Swain and cast my Q, but a Braum jumped in front with his shield and Beatrice went poof! This is animal cruelty!
RIOT should change the spell so that Unbreakable and Wind Wall stop Beatrice from travelling past, but don't stop the spell, similar to Gragas' Q.

Otherwise I'll be forced to contact PETA regarding this incident.  Don't think that they'll buy that "fake fur" excuse either (looking at you, {{champion:77}} ).

replies.body:
http://orig09.deviantart.net/d903/f/2015/102/0/4/048638d7018986854c27b357203a2b20-d776lxg.png

######Saw this awhile ago, had to do a lot of searching but I eventually found it again, artist is credited in the comic
You actually considered the artist when sharing the comic. Imma cry.

> [{quoted}](name=Jackalopeer,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=29nUze6i,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2017-06-28T04:31:44.843+0000)
>
> You actually considered the artist when sharing the comic. Imma cry.

I _hate it_ when a piece of art is shared and no artist credits are to be found! The artist deserves it for his or her hard work, and it makes it easier for fans to find the artist if they want more stuff.
I follow a few League comics (not so much recently, but I should get back into them!) and if someone ever uses one of their images without citing, I will cite the artist in the comments.
rip old galio
The bird **was** the word.

> [{quoted}](name=Lakrosin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=29nUze6i,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-28T00:53:53.902+0000)
>
> The bird **was** the word.

（゜◇゜）
or should swain get reported to peta for throuing beatrice at a very bird-unfriendly structure
he can also eat your ult. don't tempt him to eat you.

Birds have a long,horrible history with clear wall-like objects. I'm not suprised your bird fell to his wall. Valor is also rendered useless against yasuo's wall,however he immediately makes a full recovery. Rumor has it that these walls are also able to slay fishes in tsunamis as well.

it does block gragas q and make it dissappear
but it stops fizz ult so no animal cruelty there
just a bird thing i guess :)
Yeah it saves the fish... only to have it get eaten by a huge ass shark.
But the shark survives, right?
well it is on land most of the time...
Waat!? Beatrice wasn't just given a moustache? That IS animal cruelty indeed! :O
*insert sad violin music with black and white filter*
bird goes splat on a windshield, in the ride from bronze to challenger

Sorry, I know you love that bird but...

All demonically possessed animals are considered a public hazard much like rabid animals, and putting them down is just whats expected.

Again, I know you really love that bird, but it just had to be done. We couldnt have it making other birds demonic.
>...Did someone just say "demonic"? ~ {{champion:17}}
**she** has a name and its Beatrice
{{champion:201}}: BIRD STOMP!!!
sshe DOES reappear on your shoulder... right?
